query: SELECT tc.id, tc.taskId, tc.templateId, t.name as taskName, ct.name as templateName FROM taskChecklists tc LEFT JOIN tasks t ON tc.taskId = t.id LEFT JOIN checklistTemplates ct ON tc.templateId = ct.id LIMIT 10
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33MDJNP9oQHNu88.9be2e504806b --database XGUfRkFw3wTJbZrCqsFJBu --execute SELECT tc.id, tc.taskId, tc.templateId, t.name as taskName, ct.name as templateName FROM taskChecklists tc LEFT JOIN tasks t ON tc.taskId = t.id LEFT JOIN checklistTemplates ct ON tc.templateId = ct.id LIMIT 10
